mapper.select: select e.id, e.ename, e.cell, e.deptid, d.dname, to_char(e.hiredate,'YYYY-MM-DD') hiredate, e.job from superEmp e, superDept d where e.deptid = d.deptid AND e.ename like '%'||#{sename}||'%' and d.dname like '%'||#{dname}||'%' AND e.job like '%'||#{job}||'%' and d.dname NOT LIKE '최고경영진'
SELECT DISTINCT d.deptid key, d.dname val FROM superDept d WHERE parentDept IS NULL AND dname NOT LIKE '최고경영진'
SELECT e.ename, e.id, e.auth, e.job, d.dname FROM superEmp e, superDept d WHERE e.deptid = d.deptid AND e.id = #{id}
SELECT DISTINCT job FROM superEmp WHERE job NOT LIKE 'ceo'
SELECT DISTINCT d.deptid key, d.dname val FROM superDept d WHERE parentDept IS NULL AND dname NOT LIKE '최고경영진'
SELECT DISTINCT auth FROM superEmp WHERE auth NOT LIKE 1
